videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Grist's Infamous Insect Combo  Modern Meme or Dream?
videos.description:
Is it possible to combo off with Grist in Modern thanks to Recross the Paths being able to stack our deck with Insects to trigger Grist's +1 a bunch of times in a single turn? Is the plan a meme or a dream? Let's play a Modern league and find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/meme-or-dream-grist-insect-combo-modern
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6943289#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/QBLne
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/KQEg7
